name: Pet Sematary
description:
Pet Sematary was made by Patrick Doyon & Jesse Eisenbart for SuFEST hosted by the Hand Eye Society.

Controls
  • Move : WASD
  • Throw : Right Click
  • Super Throw : Right Click Hold
  • Melee Attack : Left Click
  • Roll : Space
  • Dig : E
- - - - - - - - - - - - Patrick Doyon
